scancerrna.description: SCancerRNA provides identifiers for non-coding RNA biomarkers, including long ncRNA, microRNA, PIWI-interacting RNA, small nucleolar RNA, and circular RNA, with data on their differential expression at the cellular level in cancer.
scancerrna.name: SCancerRNA

publications.title: SCancerRNA: Expression at the Single-cell Level and Interaction Resource of Non-coding RNA Biomarkers for Cancers
